title: 求大神帮忙解答错误报告！暮色mod总是闪退！
author: yujin337
txt_content:
刚开始玩的好好地。后来就一直闪退，不造为啥~求大神帮忙看一下~
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Quite honestly, I wouldn't worry myself about that.

Time: 14-10-26 下午10:48
Description: Unexpected error
